main event: Senator sighted an unidentified barrel-shaped object near La Veta, Colorado on November 25, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as barrel-shaped, approximately 50 to 60 feet long and 15 to 20 feet in diameter., It was luminous, emitted a glow, and made no sound., The object was observed hovering at an altitude of 500 to 1000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 7 seconds., Owners of a local restaurant also reported seeing an unidentified object on the same date.
witness description: Senator and owners of the Alpine Gate Restaurant
